column2: You can change the settings of the vassal CBs at any time.
Acquire all cores from the vassals of $RECIPIENT$
Acquire all vassal core provinces from $RECIPIENT$
Acquire all enemy vassal §Ystates§W where we have §Ycore provinces§W
Extend vassal CBs to AI countries. §RTry this at your own risk.§W
Restrict vassal CBs to player countries only.
According to our peace treaty with $FROMCOUNTRY$, we must give up lands that rightfully belong to them from among our vassals -- and only the ones that belong to them.
